Method Detail

registerForPortChangeNotify

public boolean registerForPortChangeNotify(HostInfo entry,
                                           SwitchPortChange cb)
Register for notification of migration to new switch port.

Register for call-back when an update to the host-info list determines that the IP address and link-layer address pair supplied in the initial HostInfo entry has changed from the current (initially the supplied) switch port.

unregisterForPortChangeNotify

public boolean unregisterForPortChangeNotify(HostInfo entry,
                                             SwitchPortChange cb)
Unregister for notification of migration to new switch port.

Parameters:
entry - the specific entry to remove the call-back for. If null all references to cb will be removed.
